#summary Getting Started with Savvy.UI

=The Basic=
First and foremost, you need to include jQuery and Savvy.UI !JavaScript Library, e.g:
{{{
<script src="/path/to/jquery.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script src="/path/to/savvyui.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
}}}
Remember to include jQuery before including Savvy.UI. If you wish to get more detail on using jQuery, please visit [http://docs.jquery.com/ jQuery Documentation Wiki].
